channel.title: Will pay for pvp. box coder!
channel.description:
ok anyone that can code pvp. boxes about where i have hem marked in red in the pictures below, ill pay you $45.00 usd. via. paypal. i really i want to get pvp. boxes but i cant get them to work. below is a link to my source code, and pitcures of where i want the pk boxes. when you finish contact me at colbym9595@hotmail.com so i can pay you. then after i pay you can send me the source code with the pk boxes in it. please ppl. i need help!
[IMG]http://i308.photobucket.com/albums/kk354/pker9141/aa11wild1-2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i308.photobucket.com/albums/kk354/pker9141/aa11wild1-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i308.photobucket.com/albums/kk354/pker9141/aa11wild11.jpg[/img]
and my source code can be found at [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=xgm8oo4n]www.megaupload.com/?d=xgm8oo4n[/url]

item.title: Will pay for pvp. box coder!
item.dc:creator: @LOLMFAO LOLMFAO
item.description:
@LOLMFAO wrote:

okay like just add makeGlobalObject around the area in the wildy cuz they’re already wild so thats half the work done for you =D and after that (which would take a while) you need to add a command to tele you there for example the dig site pk area

[code]
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“digsite”))
{
teleportToX = XCOORD;
teleportToY = YCOORD;
sendMessage(“You Teleport To The Dig Site PK Box”);
}

dont hes a scammer btw[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Will pay for pvp. box coder!

item.title: Will pay for pvp. box coder!
item.dc:creator: @LOLMFAO LOLMFAO
item.description:
@LOLMFAO wrote:

the ones in the wildy are very simple you can just like Xcvxcv2 said use make global objects around the ones in the wildy because i think they’re already wildy all you have to is add the command to teleport them there like this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("digsitePK")) { teleportToX = XCOORD; teleportToY = YCOORD; sendMessage("You Teleport To The Dig Site PK Area"); }

whatever you do don’t pay somebody though

Read full topic
item.source: Will pay for pvp. box coder!

item.title: Will pay for pvp. box coder!
item.dc:creator: @hippie_0 hippie_0
item.description:
@hippie_0 wrote:

hey well i wouldn’t pay for such a simple deed first off the ones in the wildy all you have to do is add some makeGlobalObject codes like using danger signs around the perimiter and banks for obviously banking then you would need a code to teleport there for my example i will use dig site

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("digsite"))
{
teleportToX = XCOORD;
teleportToY = YCOORD;
sendMessage("You Teleport To The Dig Site PK Area");
}

simple as that its not worth $45
heck i would probably do it for free if i got like co or admin so much easier and affordable for you =P and it isn’t really even worth co

Read full topic
item.source: Will pay for pvp. box coder!

item.title: Will pay for pvp. box coder!
item.dc:creator: @chris_lol chris lol
item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

umm why wouldent i? as soon as i get the pvp zones complete im launching the second beta version of my server, and people will need to pay to use it. so its not like im just giving out $45 here.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2008, 02:05:38 PM[/size][hr]so if anyones going to reply to this with anything helpfull, id appriciate it. and btw i tried my best to code it but it always comes up with some kinda error.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2008, 02:06:59 PM[/size][hr]btw my server is bloodrun.no-ip.info if you need to get on it. right now its on a backup b cuz it got messed up yesterday, but the map is exactly the same.

Read full topic

item.title: Will pay for pvp. box coder!
item.dc:creator: @xcvxcv2 xcvxcv2
item.description:
@xcvxcv2 wrote:

i can help you code but rewarding people with money isnt allowed and i wont do all the work for you try with the makeglobalobjects for a border around the area and maybe some fences that you can range/mage across also search some tutorials on how to make areas pvp. it might be a little hard now since they deleted the tutorials but you can search using a website (dont want to say or it might be classified as advertising) try not to make ppl do work for you and then take it for you (aka leeching) good luck

Read full topic
